job description:
The Research Foundation for Mental Hygiene, Inc. is seeking a qualified candidate to fill a half-time position in the outpatient Schizophrenia research clinic at NYSPI.

The individual would be responsible for conducting diagnostic and clinical interviews and ratings for multiple clinical trials with patients with Schizophrenia.

Minimum Qualifications:

Minimum - Masters in Psychology or Social Work. Research experience and interest required.

Preferred Qualifications:

Clinical experience with individuals suffering from Schizophrenia and experience conducting diagnostic and clinical interviews preferred.
